version_description: This is the Village Session version, that has been recorded as a lesson here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D0ar9NVuoVU.

No capo, just chords with a few filler notes in between, hope it's as accurate as it sound to me.
Very simple and easy way to play John Mayer's song "In the Blood" from his new album: "The Search for Everything" without having to use a capo :).
